author: Floof
install_msg: The Banishment cog has been installed! Users with the required role can now use `[p]banish` and `[p]unbanish`.
name: Banishment
short: A tool to temporarily banish users by stripping and saving their roles.
description: Provides `banish` and `unbanish` commands for moderation. Banish removes a user's roles (saving them for later) and applies a Muted role. Unbanish removes the Muted role and restores all saved roles. Command usage is restricted to a configurable role.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores a list of a user's role IDs when they are banished, linked to their user ID and the server ID. This data is deleted when the user is unbanished.
